first_translate: heylon, the northernmost region
second_translate: Heylon, the northern frontline
label: heylonthe northern frontlines

first_translate: so this is the heylon estate...
second_translate: so this is the duke of heylon's castle...
label: this must be duke heylon’s castle.

first_translate: it’s so intimidating...
second_translate: It’s incredibly intimidating...
label: what an incredibly strong presence...

hangle: 나는 결국 가족에게 떠밀려 무자비한 공작이 다스린다는 북부 최전방에 왔다.
first_translate: in the end, my family sent me to the northernmost region, which is ruled by the ruthless duke heylon.
second_translate: In the end, my family pushed me to the northernmost frontline, ruled by the ruthless Duke Heylon.
label: after being  pushed out by my  family, I finally arrived  at the northern front, which was ruled by  the ruthless duke  heylon.

hangle: 딱 봐도 마왕성 같은 게 사람 엄청 굴릴 것 같다.
first_translate: just looking at this place, I can tell they’re going to work me to death.
second_translate: This place looks just like a demon king’s castle… They must work people to the bone here.
label: this place  feels more like  the castle of an evil overlord.

first_translate: I brought this upon myself...
second_translate: I brought this upon myself...
label: ugh,  I think I dug my own grave.

first_translate: this way.
second_translate: This way.
label: this way.

first_translate: open the doors.
second_translate: Open the door.
label: open  the doors.

first_translate: the doors are so big...!!
second_translate: The door is huge...!!
label: they’re  so huge...!

first_translate: duke of the north, abel heylon
second_translate: duke of the north, abel heylon
label: abel heylon,  the duke of the north

first_translate: you must have prepared yourself for this, but...
second_translate: You must have braced yourself in your own way, but...
label: I’m sure it  took courage to come here,

hangle: 너 같은 어린애는 여기에 필요 없다.
first_translate: ...we don’t need a child like you here.
second_translate: A kid like you is not needed here.
label: but we don’t need children like you.

first_translate: go back home.
second_translate: Go back home.
label: go back  home.

hangle: 쓸모없는 자에게 투자할 시간은 없다 이건가.
first_translate: he’s saying he doesn’t have time to waste on someone useless.
second_translate: So he means he has no time to invest in someone useless, huh.
label: is he saying  that I’m a waste of time?

hangle: 아벨은 모르겠지만, 지금의 나는 마땅히 돌아갈 곳도 없어.
first_translate: abel doesn’t know this, but I don’t have a home to go back to.
second_translate: I don’t know if abel knows, but right now, I have nowhere to return to.
label: I’m sure abel doesn’t know this, but there’s nowhere for me to go  back to.

hangle: 원작 속의, 자신의 마법적 재능을 모르던 피오나는-
first_translate: in the original story, fiona didn’t know about her magic powers.
second_translate: In the original story, Fiona was unaware of her magical talent.
label: in the novel,  fiona wasn’t aware of her talent for magic…

first_translate: she was kicked out of both the green and heylon families.
second_translate: She was kicked out of both the Green and Heylon.
label: …and was cast  out of both house green and house heylon.

first_translate: the pain of being abandoned by the world...
second_translate: The wound of being abandoned by the world at this moment...
label: the pain of  being abandoned  by everyone in the world was…

hangle: 후에 피오나가 악역이 되는 결정적인 계기가 된다.
first_translate: ...was what ultimately turned fiona into a villain.
second_translate: This became the decisive factor that turned Fiona into a villain.
label: …what later sent her down the dark path of villainy.

first_translate: but I know about my powers now.
second_translate: But now, I know.
label: but unlike  the original fiona,
